game.name: Nimillion - The last expedition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Metroidvania Spaceship adventure with physics-based rocket ship controls. Retro-inspired Thruster-only flight, unlock and upgrade abilities, solve physics puzzles, battle tough bosses, conquer brutal terrain. Easy to learn, hard to master old-school thrills!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Metroidvania Spaceship adventure with physics-based rocket ship controls. Retro-inspired Thruster-only flight, unlock and upgrade abilities, solve physics puzzles, battle tough bosses, conquer brutal terrain. Easy to learn, hard to master old-school thrills!
